sentences.sContent: The small fines for this type of crime do not act as much of a deterrent .
sentences.sCn: 对于这种罪行，小额罚金起不到多大的威慑作用。

sentences.sContent: the deterrent effect of prison sentences

synos.tran: 威慑；妨碍物；挽留的事物

words.tran: 威慑；妨碍物；挽留的事物

trans.tranCn: 威慑；妨碍物；挽留的事物
trans.tranOther: something that makes someone less likely to do something, by making them realize it will be difficult or have bad results
